Class HelperReportSent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.argus.sms.app.utils.HelperReportSent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<Cursor>

    public class HelperReportSent
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<Cursor>
    Created by alexandre on 20/01/16. Classe used to ressend all sms for a given report.
